title: Add provided YouTube links to Video Lessons

requirements.text:
Update the centralized video lessons content source to use the user-provided YouTube URLs for the existing Video Lessons items by setting `videoUrl` values in `frontend/src/content/videoLessons.ts`.

Assign the four provided URLs to the first four existing lessons (in the same order as listed by the user):
1) `speaking-confidence`
2) `youtube-getting-started`
3) `tiktok-getting-started`
4) `presentation-skills`

Keep the remaining lessons (`content-planning-youtube`, `tiktok-trends`) unchanged (their `videoUrl` may remain undefined) unless additional URLs are provided later.

When saving the URLs, preserve the exact user-provided URLs while ensuring the stored string does not include accidental whitespace characters that would break the link when opened (e.g., trim any leading/trailing spaces).

quotes:
https://youtu.be/AYcqLymo6M4?si=oXI9wB5JR8c1UUur 

https://youtu.be/hvrLd5KKm0s? si=OZGyztKLlSUU6OkG

https://youtu.be/ICU-j1pItlA?si=TY7dOVpeQ7DIGCIh

https://youtu.be/VNkaGh7wQt0?si=6TxjwpNIVev4u0wS 

Use these videos on the lessons

acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/content/videoLessons.ts`, the lessons with ids `speaking-confidence`, `youtube-getting-started`, `tiktok-getting-started`, and `presentation-skills` each have a non-empty `videoUrl` set to the corresponding provided YouTube link.
On the Video Lessons section UI, the four updated lessons show the “Watch Video” button (not the “Video link coming soon” message).
Clicking “Watch Video” on each of the four updated lessons opens the correct YouTube URL in a new tab/window.
Any user-facing text remains in English.

constraints: Frontend files under `frontend/src/components/ui` and the paths listed in `frontend.immutablePaths` must not be edited.
Do not add new backend services or databases; this change should be implemented purely by updating the existing frontend content source.
nonGoals: Creating new lessons beyond the existing list in `frontend/src/content/videoLessons.ts`.
Changing the Video Lessons section layout/styling beyond what is necessary to reflect the presence of the video URLs.
Downloading or hosting the videos; videos must remain outbound YouTube links.
